full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 799 Filed 08/04/25 Page 1 of 1 UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT SOUTHERN DISTRICT OF NEW YORK UNITED STATES OF AMERICA, -- against -- GHISLAINE MAXWELL, Defendant. ORDER GRANTING MOTION TO WITHDRAW Upon consideration of the Motion to Withdraw, it is HEREBY ORDERED THAT Christian R. Everdell and Mark S. Cohen of Cohen & Gresser LLP are granted leave to withdraw as co-counsel for defendant Ghislaine Maxwell in the above-captioned matter. Dated: August 4, 2025 Paul A. Engelmayer The Honorable Paul A. Engelmayer United States District Judge DOJ-OGR-00015078

text_blocks.content: UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT SOUTHERN DISTRICT OF NEW YORK
UNITED STATES OF AMERICA, -- against -- GHISLAINE MAXWELL, Defendant.

Upon consideration of the Motion to Withdraw, it is HEREBY ORDERED THAT Christian R. Everdell and Mark S. Cohen of Cohen & Gresser LLP are granted leave to withdraw as co-counsel for defendant Ghislaine Maxwell in the above-captioned matter.
The Honorable Paul A. Engelmayer United States District Judge

organizations: United States District Court for the Southern District of New York

additional_notes: The document is a court order granting a motion to withdraw as co-counsel for the defendant Ghislaine Maxwell. The order is signed by Judge Paul A. Engelmayer.
